title: Tata Motors to build Rs 9,000-cr plant in Tamil Nadu
description: Tata Motors signs MoU with TN government to establish a vehicle manufacturing facility, investing Rs. 9000 crores and creating 5000 jobs. TN Industries Minister TRB Rajaa and Tamil Nadu CM MK Stalin attend the signing ceremony in Chennai. Tata Motors' second plant in south India after Dharwad. VinFast plans manufacturing in Thoothukudi.
